snippet.title: SAGA 6: Strange Odyssey walkthrough (Apple II - Adventure international)
snippet.description:
At the galaxy's rim, there are rewards aplenty to be harvested from a long dead civilization, including fabulous treasures and advanced technologies. Prepare yourself for the incredible!

Strange Odyssey  (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/count) was a graphics adventure game published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][. It is the sixth adventure game of the Scott Adams Graphic Adventure series. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

This game was very difficult to find. Thanks to 4AM for sharing it with everyone!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Image - 4AM
Cover art - www.mocagh.org
Walkthrough - trs-80.com (Ira Goldklang)
